text: Benno Müller-Hill (5 February 1933 – 11 August 2018)Benno Müller-Hill was a German biologist and author. Together with Walter Gilbert, Müller-Hill purified the lac repressor, the first genetic control protein to be isolated. Müller-Hill has lectured widely and written books on the misuse of science by the Nazis. ==References== Category:German biologists Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Benno Müller-Hill
